project.description:
Daily key benchmark score monitor and check Owners: Hsinyi Lee, Fu-Ching Yang Backup: Mike Schoenfelder
Deprecate this task because it is replaced by task `score_guard_pcs`

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash hostname pwd umask 002
# Environment setup # JOB_NAME and BUILD_NUMBER are Jenkins variables local_build_root=/scratch/jenkins/archived-builds/$JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER ##share_root=/work/sparta/regression.nettmp/score_guard share_root=/work/sparta/regression/$JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER test_date=`TZ='Asia/Taipei' date '+%Y-%m-%d'` test_time=`TZ='Asia/Taipei' date '+%H%M'` test_time_db=`TZ='Asia/Taipei' date '+%m%d%Y%X'` ##target_dir=$share_root/$test_date/$test_time target_dir=/work/sparta/regression/$JOB_NAME/$BUILD_NUMBER echo $target_dir
# Garbage collection function gc { # Move data back chmod go+w -R $local_build_root &> /dev/null || true rsync -ravh $local_build_root/* $target_dir > /dev/null # Delete the Jenkins temporary folder ##rm -rf $local_build_root # Delete log more than 7 days find $share_root -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -mtime +7 -exec rm -rf {} + }
export SLURM_ACCOUNT=perf_ci export SALLOC_ACCOUNT=perf_ci export SLURM_BATCH=perf_ci
# Create the local/share folder mkdir -p $local_build_root mkdir -p $target_dir trap gc EXIT
cd $local_build_root
#-------------DO NOT MODIFY LINES ABOVE-------------
# Doing stuff here git clone --recursive git@github.com:sifive/score_guard.git -b score_guard-federation pushd score_guard/testfield ../federation_get_runsuite.sh PERF_DB_INFO='golden_num' ../federation_get_score.sh
cat federation/dashboard_insert_alert.log
# If any score parsing fail, this run fails and exits if [ -f federation/score_parsing_error ]; then cat federation/score_parsing_error exit 1 fi
# Then, if any perf alert raises, this run is unstable if [ -s federation/dashboard_insert_alert.log ]; then exit 100 fi
popd
find $(dirname $share_root) -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -mtime +7 -exec rm -rf {} +
